title: Freed of murder charges after 43 years, why is Indian-origin Subramanyam Vedam still not free in US?
summary_full: An Indian-origin man, exonerated after 43 years in prison for a murder conviction overturned due to withheld evidence, now faces deportation. Despite his release from state prison, he was immediately taken into federal immigration custody, with bail denied due to a decades-old minor drug felony.
